original_text: The soldiers used some branches with thorns to make a crown for Jesus. They put it on his head. Then put a dark red coat on him too. They did all this as if he was a king.
korean_text: 군인들이 가시나무로 관을 엮어 그의 머리에 씌우고 자색 옷을 입히고

sentences.original_text: The soldiers used some branches with thorns
to make a crown for Jesus
They put it on his head
Then put a dark red coat on him too
sentences.korean_translation: 그런 다음 그에게 진홍색 외투도 입혔습니다

sentences.original_text: They did all this as if he was a king
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 그가 왕인 것처럼 이 모든 것을 했습니다
